## static-tree-codegen package

Code generation for package [static-tree](https://github.com/vnphanquang/static-tree/tree/main/packages/static-tree)

## Functions

|  Function | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [generate(serializedNode)](./static-tree-codegen.generate.md) | Generate typescript source for <code>static-tree</code> from a serialized node |
|  [generateBuildInput(serializedNode)](./static-tree-codegen.generatebuildinput.md) | Generate the build input as in <code>static-tree.ExtendedTNodeBuildInput</code> |
|  [generateImportStatement()](./static-tree-codegen.generateimportstatement.md) | Generate the import statement for <code>static-tree.tBuild</code> |
|  [generateTBuild(serializedNode)](./static-tree-codegen.generatetbuild.md) | Generate the <code>static-tree.tBuild</code> call expression |
